sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./campground.scss"; const Campground = ({ campgrounds }) => { const {id} = useParams(); const campground = campgrounds.find((campground) => campground.id === parseInt(id, 10)); console.log(parseInt(id, 10)); console.log(campgrounds); return (

Spot Wildcamp

{campground.title}

{campground.country}

{campground.description}

Partagé par : {campground.author.username}

Ajouter un commentaire

Parsnip

il y a 10 jours

Super spot !

Rutabaga

il y a 11 jours

Je recommande aussi

); } export default Campground;
